title: Isn’t it ironic
content:
that the typography is so goofy on this site

[http://www.yearofreading.org.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706165418/http:/www.yearofreading.org.uk/ "http://www.yearofreading.org.uk/")

one of the links from the site is pretty cool though

[http://www.librarything.com/zeitgeist](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706165418/http:/www.librarything.com/zeitgeist "http://www.librarything.com/zeitgeist")

 [‹ My Pet Peeve](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706165418/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41152 "Go to previous forum topic") [PLEASE COMMENT ON MY TYPE LOGO ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706165418/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41245 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mike_duggan

comments.content: Thanks, Mike. The library thing looks interesting.

<cite>Isn2019t it ironic</cite>  
Yes. Better use a primes or an acute accent.  
;°)
